text: The Cambrian Line (Welsh: Rheilffordd y Cambrian), sometimes called the Cambrian Coast Line, is a railway line that runs from Shrewsbury, England to Aberystwyth and Pwllheli, Wales. It is a very scenic route. It runs through the Cambrian Mountains in central Wales and along the coast of Cardigan Bay. Category:Railway lines in Wales
title: Cambrian Line
